references: R. Austin, R. K. Guy, and R. Nowakowski, unpublished notes, circa 1987.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..300
Milan Janjic, Enumerative Formulas for Some Functions on Finite Sets
formula: Expansion of (1+2x) / (1-x)^5.Essentially Stirling numbers of second kind - see A028246.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
